Module: nbconvert.writers.stdout¶

Contains Stdout writer

1 Class¶

class IPython.nbconvert.writers.stdout.StdoutWriter(config=None, **kw)¶

Bases: IPython.nbconvert.writers.base.WriterBase

Consumes output from nbconvert export...() methods and writes to the stdout stream. Allows for quick debuging of nbconvert output. Using the debug flag makes the writer pretty-print the figures contained within the notebook.

write(output, resources, **kw)¶

Consume and write Jinja output.

See base for more...
